*15 spicy *0 dry *20 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Occa''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Razz]], at least 1 [[Figy]], at least 1 [[Tamato]] and at least 1 [[Spelon]].
